nodes.text: Committee for transportation of construction materials

The committee for transportation of construction materials was a committee in the Galactic Republic's Galactic Senate, led by Senator Bail Organa of Alderaan, that dealt with the transportation of construction materials to planets in the Mid Rim. Other members of the committee included Senators Mon Mothma of Chandrila and Onaconda Farr of Rodia. Several months into her tenure as senator of Naboo, Padmé Amidala joined the committee.
